title: Developing Instructional Design Leadership Competencies in Higher Education Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners perform project activities in smartphone-based, technology-constrained environments while developing online learning design competencies in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three roles of instructional design leaders according to the organizational structure of higher education institutions.
Learners can conduct case analyses comparing the influence of instructional design leaders in centralized/decentralized organizational structures.
Learners can propose at least two effective instructional design strategies for language learning projects in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
